metadata.title: Iron Board Hanger Wall Mount, Electric Iron Holder Iron and Ironing Board Storage Organizer Shelf with Removable Hooks for Household Bathroom Laundry Room(Black)
features: 【Space Saver】 This iron board hanger maximizes space and eliminates laundry room clutter with this clever wall-mounted solution. There is a wire storage slot at the bottom to help you organize long wires. 2 hooks below can store T-shaped or V-shaped ironing board to save space and keep your laundry room tidy.

【Heat Resistant up to 392℉】The iron board holder adopts PBT anti-flame retardant material, which can with stand high temperature of 392℉. Tips: Most irons max temperature is 401℉, rest it for 5 minutes after usage.

【Heavy Duty】 Measures 4.5"*11.3"*5.6", suitable for most irons, with ease for max 5 inches width. The hook made of high quality steel wire has high bearing capacity and can be used for hanging ironing boards or various small items.

【Easy to Install】 First insert the guardrail into the holes on both sides of the holder, and then install the hook. Finally use the three included screws to secure the ironing board to any wall or wardrobe.
【Applicable Places】 You can install it in the hotel room, parlor, bedroom, office, wardrobe, laundry room and other places.
description: Conyee Iron Board Hanger Wall Mount

Keep your home neat and organized. Ironing board hanger wall mount designed for storing your hot unplugged iron and ironing board in one place for space saving.  Made from heat resistant PBT plastic, can stand 150 degree fahenheit, safe for hot unplugged iron.  Built-in storage pocket for keeping iron cords, makes you no more fuss with tangled cords.
Material: PBT Plastic Color: White / Black Size: 4.5’’*11.3’’*5.6’’ Fit Iron Width : Less than 5in Fit Type : Normal Iron with A Flat Base Mount Type : Wall Mount Drill Holes : 3x
1 * Iron Board Holder 1 * Reinforced Guardrail 1 * Hook 3 * Screws 3 * Anchors
Please measure the iron size first（Fit within 5 inch wide）. If you have any questions about the purchased product, please let us know and we will solve it for you in time.
